name: Mexican Hot Chocolate Popsicles
description: These Mexican hot chocolate paletas (paletas de chocolate) are creamy and sweet, chocolaty and rich, with a touch of cinnamon.
recipeIngredient: 1  Avocado (ripe, cut in half, flesh removed)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the coconut-almond milk to a very low simmer over low heat. Add chocolate tablets and sugar, and stir with a whisk or molinillo.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring the coconut-almond milk to a very low simmer over low heat. Add chocolate tablets and sugar, and stir with a whisk or molinillo.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the chocolate has dissolved pour it in a container and let it cool completely in the fridge or freezer.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the chocolate has dissolved pour it in a container and let it cool completely in the fridge or freezer.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chocolate mixture, avocado, and sugar in the blender, and puree until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the chocolate mixture, avocado, and sugar in the blender, and puree until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into popsicle molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into popsicle molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.

keywords: hot chocolate popsicles, mexican hot chocolate, spicy popsicles
